headline: Moody’s Corporation (MCO): $1.8 Billion Revenue Surge and Strategic Insights in Warren Buffett’s Portfolio
summary: We recently published a list of Warren Buffett’s 10 Longest-Held Stocks. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Moody’s Corporation (NYSE:MCO) stands against other Warren Buffett’s longest-held stocks. Warren Buffett has cemented his legacy as Wall Street’s most successful investor. During the high-flying stock market of the 1960s, he leveraged […]
